titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Willett Forrest Ramsdell papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Professor of forest land management at the University of Michigan.
archdesc.scopecontent: Memoranda, correspondence, and other papers relating to his service as a teacher with the School of Military Government in Charlottesville, Virginia, during World War II.

corpname.primary_name: United States. School of Military Government (Charlottesville, Va.)
